A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie it's like a transformers movie\, it's made to catter the eye of the casual espectator\, but fails as a part of a film legacy. As a long time star wats fan this movie feels like a slap in the face\, as a cinephile this movie it's just a sad reminder of how a movie characters shouldn't be written. In the good news\, I think totally kills my interest in the new movie.
